entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low zero.

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
